title: Is there a head first book for Angular JS? - Quora

response.answer_text: No book For Angular JS by head first so far but there are some awesome alternatives. I found a book, and you should check this, too: https://www.google.com.pk/url?sa=t&source=web&rct=j&url=http://sd.blackball.lv/library/AngularJS_in_60_minutes_Dan_Wahlin_May_2013.pdf&ved=0ahUKEwiPvozZ6uzWAhVDtBoKHRKMAQcQFgg7MAI&usg=AOvVaw3CBHbV8xj7JqQ1ikYDf9X7

Head First books are a great deal to begin with especially for programming found them useful for Java specifically however i haven’t bumped into one for Angular ,but the one that i think is equivalent to Head first in terms and detail is ng-book The Complete Book on AngularJS .There is a version for Angular one and another one for angular 2 .Hopefully soon for Angular 4
